entries.meaning: An arrangement whereby several people travel together in the same car in order to save costs, reduce pollution etc.
examples: The neighbors decided on a carpool to get their kids to school, so that they wouldn't each have to drive every day.

entries.meaning: The group of people who participate in such a pool.

verbs.description: carpool (third-person singular simple present carpools, present participle carpooling, simple past and past participle carpooled)

entries.meaning: To travel together in such a pool.
